short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the feed from Instagram, so that you can browse distraction free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you addicted to Instagram or do you just want to focus more? Then UnInstagram is for you.

It redesigns Instagram so that you can browse with intention

UnInstagram also works on mobile browsers that support extensions
(Such as Kiwi Browser)

UnInternet is a package of UnYoutube, UnInstagram and UnAmazon
